document.text:
From: 
To: Joe Nascimento 
Subject: RE: 
Date: Wed, 24 Nov 2021 14:32:12 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.jpg 
Hi Joe, 
Thanks very much for letting me know. Hope you and your family have a happy Thanksgiving. 
From: Joe Nascimento 
Sent: Tuesday, November , 1 1: M 
To: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] 
Hi 
I wanted to alert you to a recent development. was recently served with a subpoena for a deposition in 
v. 
In M, 
I 
). ex-husband is being sued by a 
former employee on several grounds including sex discrimination, battery and IIED. is getting dragged in because 
they want to connect â€”= to actions while working for Epstein. 
The depo was set for November 30. The Defendants filed a motion to quash (attached), which the court granted and 
stayed the depo. The Plaintiff has filed a motion to reconsider (attached), and the Court has ordered the Defendant to 
respond. The Plaintiffs have included a copy of the NPA, depo and have made numerous factual allegations 
related to Epstein in their motion. 
I'll keep you updated as I learn more. 
Have a Happy Thanksgiving, 
Joe 
Jose E. Nascimento, Esq. 
AMSEL RABEN NASCIMENTO, PLLC 
Lawyer's Plaza I 4th Floor 
AMSEL KAREN 
NASCIMENTO 
EFTA00024985
